sub_topic: Finding the determinant of a matrix
message_1:
What is the determinant of the matrix A =
[[4, 6], [7, 3]]?
message_2: The determinant of a 2x2 matrix A = [[a, b], [c, d]] is calculated as (ad - bc). In this case, A = [[4, 6], [7, 3]], so the determinant is (4 * 3) - (6 * 7) = 12 - 42 = -30.
